Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near 95th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near 95th due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include the #3 King Drive or the #29 State bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
